column2: "Na nda no mu no John Onumanyi no bae bɛkaa asɛm wɔ Judea sar do
"Na oyi nye nyia nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia kaa no ho asɛm dɛ
column3: Obi ne ndze retsea mu wɔ sar no do dɛ

column4: na n'edziban nye mbɛbɛw na kwaa mu wo."

column2: "Na Jerusalɛm nye Judea nyina nye asaase a abɔ Jordan ho aprɔw nyina puei kɔr no hɔ"

column3: na onumaa hɔn wɔ esutsen Jordan mu."

column2: "Na ohun Farisiifo nye Sadusiifo no mu pii dɛ wɔreba n'enuma ho no
column4: Nhurutsia mba! Woana tuee hom aso dɛ hom nguan mfi ebufuw a ɔreba no ho?"

column2: "Na afei hom nsow aba a ɔkyerɛ nnuho:"
"na mma hom nnsusu nnka wɔ hom mu dɛ
column4: hɛn egya nye Abraham: na mese hom dɛ
column5: Nyankopɔn botum dɛ onyan mba fi abo yi mu ma Abraham."

column2: "Na afei so wɔdze ekuma no ato ndua no ndwow ho dada
column3: dɛ dua biara a ɔnnsow aba pa no wobotwa no ato gya mu."
munuma hom nsu mu kɔ nnuho mu
column4: na nyia odzi m'ekyir reba no ɔkrɔn kyɛn me
column5: no nsokota mpo mennsɛ dɛ mikitsa: ɔno na obonuma hom wɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu

column2: "ɔno na no nhuwdo apaawa adze kitsa ne nsamu
column3: na ɔbɛpra ne famu hɔ kofee
column4: na ɔaboaboa n'ewifua ano ekogu san do
column5: na ntsɛw no ɔdze gya a onndum ahyew."

column2: "Nna Jesus fii Galilii baa John hɔ wɔ Jordan dɛ onnuma no."

column4: Emi na mihia dɛ ɔwo inuma me
column5: na ɔwo ereba mo hɔ yi?"
na ɔnam iyi do na yɛhyɛ tsenenee nyina ma.  Nna ɔpeen do maa no."

column2: "Na wonumaa Jesus wiei ma ofii nsu no mu no
column5: na ohun dɛ Nyankopɔn no Sunsum risian tse dɛ ebubur ba no do;"

column3: ndze bi fi sor kaa dɛ
column4: Oyi nye mo Dɔba a ɔsɔ m'enyi."
